gurmukhi: ਅਨਖੇਦ ਅਭੇਦ ਅਛੇਦ ਨਰੰ ॥ ਜਿਹ ਚਾਰ ਚਤ੍ਰ ਦਿਸ ਚਕ੍ਰ ਫਿਰੰ ॥੧੪॥੧੫੪॥
transliteration: Ankhed Abhed Achhed Naran|| Jih Chaar Chatra Dis Chakra Phiran||14||154||
translation: He is without anguish, without difference, and Unassailable Purusha. His discus rotes over all the fourteen worlds. 14.154.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਹ ਰਾਗ ਨ ਰੰਗ ਨ ਰੇਖ ਰੁਗੰ ॥ ਜਿਹ ਸੋਗ ਨ ਭੋਗ ਨ ਜੋਗ ਜੁਗੰ ॥
transliteration: Jih Raag Na Ran Na Rekh Rougadg|| Jih Sog Na Bhog Na Jog Jougadg||
translation: He is without affection, colour and without any mark. He is without sorrow, enjoyment and association with Yoga.

gurmukhi: ਭੂਅ ਭੰਜਨ ਗੰਜਨ ਅਾਦਿ ਸਿਰੰ ॥ ਜਿਹ ਬੰਦਤ ਦੇਵ ਅਦੇਵ ਨਰੰ ॥੧੫॥੧੫੫॥
transliteration: Bhooa Bhanjan Gadjan Aadh Siran|| Jih Bandat Dev Adev Naran||15||155||
translation: He is the Destroyer of the Earth and the Primal Creator. The gods, demons and men all make obeisance to Him. 15.155.

gurmukhi: ਗਣ ਕਿੰਨਰ ਜੱਛ ਭੁਜੰਗ ਰਚੇ ॥ ਮਣਿ ਮਾਣਿਕ ਮੋਤੀ ਲਾਲ ਸੁਚੇ ॥
transliteration: Gad Kinnar Jachchh Bhujan Rache|| Man(i) Maanik Motoo Laal Souche||
translation: He Created Ganas, Kinnars, Yakshas and serpents. He Created the gems, rubies, pearls and jewels.

gurmukhi: ਅਨਭੰਜ ਪ੍ਰਭਾ ਅਨਗੰਜ ਬ੍ਰਿਤੰ ॥ ਜਿਹ ਪਾਰ ਨ ਪਾਵਤ ਪੂਰ ਮਤੰ ॥੧੬॥੧੫੬॥
transliteration: Anbhanj Prabhaa Anadj Britan|| Jih Paar Na Paavat Poor Matan||16||156||
translation: His Glory is Unassailable and His account is Eternal. No. one of perfect wisdom could know His Limits. 16.156.

gurmukhi: ਅਨਖੰਡ ਸਰੂਪ ਅਡੰਡ ਪ੍ਰਭਾ ॥ ਜੈ ਜੰਪਤ ਬੇਦ ਪੁਰਾਨ ਸਭਾ ॥
transliteration: Ankhannd Saroopandannd Prabhaa|| Jai Janpat Bed Puraan Sabhaa||
translation: His is the Invincible Entity and His Glory is Unpunishable. All the Vedas and Puranas hail Him.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਹ ਬੇਦ ਕਤੇਬ ਅਨੰਤ ਕਹੈ ॥ ਜਿਹ ਭੂਤ ਅਭੂਤ ਨ ਭੇਦ ਲਹੈ ॥੧੭॥੧੫੭॥
transliteration: Jih Bed Kateh Anant Kahai|| Jih Bhoot Abhoot Na Bhed Lahai||17||157||
translation: The Vedas and Katebs (Semitic Scriptures) call Him Infinite. The Gross and Subtle both could not know His Secret. 17.157.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਹ ਬੇਦ ਪੁਰਾਨ ਕਤੇਬ ਜਪੈ ॥ ਸੁਤਸਿੰਧ ਅਦੋ ਮੁਖ ਤਾਪ ਤਪੈ ॥
transliteration: Jih Bed Puraan Kateb Japai|| Soutsindh Adho Mouch Taap Tapai||
translation: The Vedas, Puranas and Katebs pray to Him. The son of ocean i.e. moon, with face upside down performs austerities for His realization.

gurmukhi: ਕੲੀ ਕਲਪਨ ਲੌ ਤਪ ਤਾਪ ਕਰੈ ॥ ਨਹੀ ਨੈਕ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾ ਨਿਧਿ ਪਾਨ ਪਰੈ ॥੧੮॥੧੫੮॥
transliteration: Kaee Kalphan Lau Tap Taap Darai|| Nahoo Naik Kridaa Nidh(i) Paan Darai||18||158||
translation: He performs austerities for many kalpas (ages), still the Merciful Lord is not realized by him even for a short while.18.158.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਹ ਫੋਕਟ ਧਰਮ ਸਭੈ ਤਜਿ ਹੈਂ ॥ ੲਿਕ ਚਿੱਤ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾ ਨਿਧਿ ਕੋ ਭਜਿ ਹੈਂ ॥
transliteration: Jih Phokat Dharam Sabhai Taj(i) Hain|| Ik Chitt Kridaa Nidh(i) Ko Bhaj(i) Hain||
translation: Those who forsake all the fake religions, and meditate on the Merciful Lord single-mindedly;

gurmukhi: ਤੇੳੂ ਯਾ ਭਵ ਸਾਗਰ ਕੋ ਤਰ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਭਵ ਭੂਲ ਨ ਦੇਹਿ ਪੁਨਰ ਧਰ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੯॥੧੫੯॥
transliteration: Teoooo Yaa Bhav Saagad Ko Tar Hain|| Bhav Bhool Na Deh(i) Pounar Dhar Hain||19||159||
translation: They ferry across this dreadful world-ocean, and never come again in human body even by mistake.19.159.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕ ਨਾਮ ਬਿਨਾ ਨਹੀ ਕੋਟ ਬ੍ਰਤੀ ॥ ੲਿਮ ਬੇਦ ੳੁਚਾਰਤ ਸਾਰਸੁਤੀ ॥
transliteration: Ik Naam Binaa Nahoo Kot Bratoo|| Im Bed Ouchaarat Saarsoutoo||
translation: Without One Lord’s Name, one cannot be saved even by millions of fasts. The Superb Shrutis (of the Vedas) declare thus.

gurmukhi: ਜੋੳੂ ਵਾ ਰਸ ਕੇ ਚਸਕੇ ਰਸ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਤੇੳੂ ਭੂਲ ਨ ਕਾਲ ਫੰਧਾ ਫਸਿ ਹੈਂ ॥੨੦॥੧੬੦॥
transliteration: Jooo Vaa Ras Ke Chaske Ras Hain|| Teoo Bhool Na Kaal Phandhaa Phas(i) Hain||20||160||
translation: Those, who are absorbed with the ambrosia of the Name even by Mistake, they will not be entrapped in he snare of death.20.160.
